name: Roll or Die (sen53)
description:
A frantic single-screen game where you have to roll a die to match incoming numbers in time. Partially inspired Kaboom! on Atari of all the games.

How high of a score can you get?

Controls:

  • Roll the Die: WASD, Arrow Keys or D-Pad on a controller
  • Start and Restart: Space, Enter or Start on a controller
  • Toggle fullscreen: F or Select on a controller
